title: Help With Client Startup
body: Can the client be worked on so i can at least get into games i always have to close the client then be brought back to an old patch to update to the new one. Its costing me games and giving me a timer is anyone else having this problem or is there any solution to it? Im tired of the 20 minute timers for 5 games when im not afk'ing myself and its the client

replies.body: If your client notices some corrupted files or any other kind of damage, it will try to revert to the previous patch so that it can redownload the patch correctly. This can happen for a number of reasons, but most commonly due to an unstable connection while the client is patching. I'd suggest grabbing our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and running it with the repatch option to see if we can't get you a clean install. Downloading that patch with an ethernet cable as opposed to wifi would be a good step as well.
Ok done will provide updates within the upcoming days if i have the same issue
